headline: Norfolk Southern makes deal with investors to prevent another fight for control of the railroad
summary: Under the deal, Norfolk Southern will add another independent director to its board and work to further improve its operations.  Ancora, meanwhile, agreed to drop its nominations of four new board directors to be elected at next year's annual meeting.

raw.headline: Norfolk Southern makes deal with investors to prevent another fight for control of the railroad
raw.summary: Under the deal, Norfolk Southern will add another independent director to its board and work to further improve its operations.  Ancora, meanwhile, agreed to drop its nominations of four new board directors to be elected at next year's annual meeting.

headline: Norfolk Southern to add new board member as part of deal with Ancora Holdings
summary: Norfolk Southern will add a new member to its board of directors — the 14th overall and 13th independent director — under a “cooperation agreement” with shareholder Ancora Holdings, NS announced Thursday. The post Norfolk Southern to add new board member as part of deal with Ancora Holdings appeared first on FreightWaves.

headline: US dollar, Intuitive Machines, Norfolk Southern: 3 stories
summary: The market (^DJI,^GSPC, ^IXIC) stalls from its recent rally driven by the US presidential election. Yahoo Finance's Akiko Fujita provides an overview of the top headlines of trading day. The US dollar (DX-Y.NYB) moderates after spiking on new economic data raising inflation concerns earlier in the day and following election-fueled gains. Intuitive Machines (LUNR) stock is under pressure after reporting earnings. Norfolk Southern (NSC) narrowly avoids a proxy battle. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Wealth here. This post was written by Naomi Buchanan.

headline: Norfolk Southern to Add New Independent Director to Board via Cooperation Agreement with Shareholder Ancora
summary: Norfolk Southern Corporation (NYSE: NSC) ("Norfolk Southern" or the "Company") today announced that it has entered into a cooperation agreement with Ancora Holdings Group, LLC (together with certain of its affiliates, "Ancora") after constructive engagement. Under the terms of the agreement, Norfolk Southern and Ancora will work together to identify an independent director to join the Company's Board of Directors (the "Board").
